You might have seen the title and said "Oh, just another speed challenge, boring", but what makes this challenge different is that ***cheating is allowed.*** Yes, you heard me right: ***cheating is allowed.*** This means you can abuse physics all you want.

**RULES**

Get the fastest speed possible

Infinite fuel is allowed, but no burning for over 1 minute straight unless you're trying to get somewhere (Jool)

Infiniglide, K-Drives, all glitch exploits allowed.

All mods allowed, but follow the Infinite fuel rule

No Hyperedit unless you're warping yourself somewhere to start the mission

Screenshots of your final speed are required

All engines must be off at the time of the final screenshot

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-12T03:55:55Z" title="04/12/2015 03:55  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 12, 2015</time> by Laythe Dweller**
